_instructions: Copy this file to SETUP_CONFIG.json and customize for your organization, or run /setup-orchestrator to generate automatically

organization.name: YourOrganization
organization._comment_name: Your organization or project name (e.g., 'Acme Corp', 'MyProject')

repositories.name: app
repositories._comment_name: Short name for this repository (used in skill names, file references)
repositories._comment_path: Relative path from orchestrator to this repository
repositories.description: Main application with frontend and backend
repositories._comment_description: Brief description of what this repository contains

techStack._comment_other: Other important tools, libraries, or technologies

repositories._comment_filePatterns: File patterns that should trigger this repo's skill (auto-detected by wizard)
repositories._comment_keywords: Keywords in user prompts that should trigger this repo's skill (auto-detected)

_comment_repositories: Add as many repositories as you need. Each will get its own skill and guidelines.

features._comment_crossRepoDocSync: Enable cross-repo documentation synchronization (requires cross-repo-doc-sync agent)
features._comment_databaseDocs: Generate database documentation guidelines (DATABASE_SCHEMA, DATABASE_OPERATIONS, DATABASE_SECURITY)
features._comment_copilotAgents: Include GitHub Copilot custom agents (symlinked to .github/agents/ in each repo)
features._comment_skillEnforcement: Default skill enforcement: 'suggest' (show suggestion), 'warn' (show warning), 'block' (require usage)

customization._comment_includeExamples: Include code examples in generated guidelines
customization._comment_detailedGuidelines: Generate detailed guidelines vs minimal versions

paths._comment_docSyncLogs: Path to doc sync logs (if crossRepoDocSync enabled)

_examples._comment: See setup/examples/ for complete example configurations for common tech stacks:
examples: setup/examples/monorepo.json - Multiple services in one repo
